00028 namespace boost {
00029 namespace constrained_value {
00030 
00031 
00032 
00034 struct wrap
00035 {
00036 
00053     template <typename V, typename L, typename U>
00054     void operator () (V & ov, const V & nv, const within_bounds<
00055         L, U, boost::mpl::false_, boost::mpl::false_, std::less<V> > & c) const
00056     {
00057         BOOST_ASSERT( !c.compare()(c.upper_bound(), c.lower_bound()) );
00058 
00059         if( c.is_below(nv) )
00060             ov = c.upper_bound() - (c.lower_bound() - nv - 1) % (c.upper_bound() - c.lower_bound() + 1);
00061         else if( c.is_above(nv) )
00062             ov = c.lower_bound() + (nv - c.upper_bound() - 1) % (c.upper_bound() - c.lower_bound() + 1);
00063         else
00064             BOOST_ASSERT(false);
00065     }
00066 
00067 };
00068 
00069 
00070 
00072 template <
00073     typename ValueType,
00074     typename LowerType = ValueType,
00075     typename UpperType = LowerType
00076 >
00077 struct wrapping
00078 {
00079 
00080     // To be able to wrap over the bounds, both the bounds have to be included
00081     // in the range and comparison must be performed using the less than operator.
00082 
00084     typedef BOOST_DEDUCED_TYPENAME
00085         bounded<
00086             ValueType,
00087             LowerType,
00088             UpperType,
00089             wrap,
00090             boost::mpl::false_,
00091             boost::mpl::false_,
00092             std::less<ValueType>
00093         >::type type;
00094 
00095 };
00096 
00098 template <
00099     typename ValueType,
00100     ValueType LowerBound,
00101     ValueType UpperBound
00102 >
00103 struct wrapping_int
00104 {
00105 
00107     typedef BOOST_DEDUCED_TYPENAME
00108         wrapping<
00109             ValueType,
00110             boost::mpl::integral_c<ValueType, LowerBound>,
00111             boost::mpl::integral_c<ValueType, UpperBound>
00112         >::type type;
00113 
00114 };
